name: CrewAI Flight Search Agent
description: Specializes in finding the best flight options for trips. Uses CrewAI framework to analyze routes, prices, and preferences to recommend optimal flights.

skills.name: Flight Search
skills.description: Search for flights between two cities on specific dates with optional filters for budget, stops, and airline preferences.
examples: Find flights from New York to Paris on June 15, 2026
Search for non-stop flights to London under $800
